itemTooltip.indianfood.paneer: Rich and creamy, a great vegetarian protein!
itemTooltip.indianfood.gulabjamun: Soft sweet treat soaked in syrup — restores health quickly!
itemTooltip.indianfood.lassi: Cool and refreshing, cures poison effects!
itemTooltip.indianfood.dosa: Crispy and golden, gives you a speedy start!
itemTooltip.indianfood.roti: Simple flatbread, fills you up steadily.
itemTooltip.indianfood.idli: Steamed and soft — light but energizing!
